![Lorimer Jenkins](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/hero.jpeg)

## I'm a founder from England currently nomading around the US/UK/EU in AirBnb's. I'm interested in crypto, startups and software development. I have a background in venture capital and acting.

[Get in touch](mailto:hellolorimerjenkins@gmail.com)

Scroll down to

Experience my story

‚Üì

![](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/lorimerjenkins/2025/milestone.png)

2025

## Launched LiquidOps mainnet & focused on growth

This year I spent my time launching [LiquidOps' mainnet](https://x.com/Liquid_Ops/status/1905268807746060790?s=20). One of the most valuable lessons I have learnt this year is that startups are not all about product. Growth and marketing are just as (if not more) important than product, so I started [creating content](https://lorimerjenkins.com/projects#content-creator) and focusing on growth.

[![Started creating content](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/lorimerjenkins/2025/1.jpg)\\
\\
Started creating content\\
\\

ETH Denver\\

![](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/lorimerjenkins/2024/milestone.svg)

2024

## Founded LiquidOps

I came up with the idea [LiquidOps](https://lorimerjenkins.com/projects#liquidops) with [Marton Lederer](https://x.com/martonlederer) this year after a rainy ambitious walk in Cambridge where I was living at the time. [AO](https://ao.arweave.net/) was in it's infancy and we quickly realised the potential for a way to leverage the ecosystems current liquidity. I also worked as an Engineering Partner on [AO Ventures](https://aoventures.io/). I supported teams in the cohort and helped decide who participated in demo day from a technical perspective, I ended up also participating with my new idea - [LiquidOps](https://lorimerjenkins.com/projects#liquidops).

[![VentureBeat on me & LiquidOps](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/lorimerjenkins/2024/1.jpeg)\\
\\
VentureBeat on me & LiquidOps\\
\\
![Link](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/misc/link.svg)](https://venturebeat.com/business/unlocking-the-future-of-decentralized-finance-lorimer-jenkins-journey-in-building-defi-and-web3) [![Perma DAO on LiquidOps](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/lorimerjenkins/2024/2.png)\\
\\
Perma DAO on LiquidOps\\
\\
![Link](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/misc/link.svg)](https://medium.com/@perma_dao/devs-partner-to-build-arweaves-first-lending-protocol-built-with-ao-92abb69c9829) [![IBTimes on pre-seed round](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/lorimerjenkins/2024/3.jpeg)\\
\\
IBTimes on pre-seed round\\
\\
![Link](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/misc/link.svg)](https://www.ibtimes.co.uk/revolutionizing-defi-how-lorimer-jenkins-marton-lederer-are-transforming-arweave-liquidops-1729945) [![AO Ventures 1st workshop](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/lorimerjenkins/2024/4.png)\\
\\
AO Ventures 1st workshop\\
\\

Valencia team retreat

![](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/lorimerjenkins/2023/milestone.svg)

2023

## Othent built on Arweave

I became the first external Fellow at [Community Labs](https://communitylabs.com/) right after their seed round. I returned the [Wallety](https://lorimerjenkins.com/projects#wallety) grant to focus fully on the [Arweave](https://arweave.org/) ecosystem. During my time here I built [Othent](https://lorimerjenkins.com/projects#othent), Oases and [Subsidise.js](https://lorimerjenkins.com/projects#subsidisejs).

![New York with Marton Lederer](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/lorimerjenkins/2023/1.jpeg)

New York with Marton Lederer

![Virginia team retreat](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/lorimerjenkins/2023/2.jpeg)

Virginia team retreat

Buenos Aires team retreat

2022

## Joined Community Labs & taught myself to code

After realising investing didn't excite me as much as building does, I set out on a mission to learn to code from scratch. I ended up picking up learning to code quite quickly and built my first project [Wallety](https://lorimerjenkins.com/projects#wallety). It was exhausting but exhilarating. I then grabbed the attention of [Tate Berenbaum](https://x.com/TateBerenbaum) who became a close friend and I decided to join him at [Community Labs](https://communitylabs.com/).

![Architecting Othent w Tate](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/lorimerjenkins/2022/1.png)

Architecting Othent w Tate

[![Community Labs day 1](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/lorimerjenkins/2022/2.png)\\
\\
Community Labs day 1\\
\\

#selfie

Doubled down on startups

![](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/lorimerjenkins/2021/milestone.webp)

2021

## Broke into Crypto VC from my bedroom

I landed an unpaid internship at a crypto venture capital fund from the previous years cold emailing. I worked for 3 months without pay before they offered me a paid analyst role, I then worked on their venture and hedge funds for the next year. I spent my time mainly doing due dilligence on dealflow, took notes in their weekly investment communitee meetings and also met with founders who wanted to pitch the firm. During this year I also volunteered a [Polkadot Ambassador](https://polkadot.com/community/ambassador-program) where I helped build out the community and held a IRL London picnic where over 100 people turned up including ecosystem teams and founders.

![Hosting with Kadar & Clifton](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/lorimerjenkins/2021/1.jpeg)

Hosting with Kadar & Clifton

![Aves Lair day 1](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/lorimerjenkins/2021/2.png)

Aves Lair day 1

![Polkadot Ambassador](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/lorimerjenkins/2021/3.jpeg)

Polkadot Ambassador

\\

\\

I built crypto trading bots

![](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/lorimerjenkins/2020/milestone.png)

2020

## Crypto Teen & dropping out of drama school

While I was attending drama school at [Emil Dale Academy](https://www.emildale.co.uk/), I started a Crypto TikTok educational channel aimed at educating Gen Z on Crypto. In a bid to break into the industry I decided to cold email over 500 companies, investment firms and projects on if they would take me on as a unpaid worker. Out of the over 500 emails about 6 hit. I used to take Zoom meetings in the car park of school with my classmates phone that had data on while I skipped classes to pitch VCs and businesses about potentially hiring me. It was a really surreal time in my life and has just kept getting more surreal since. This was also the year I fundraised for Drama School by collecting peoples old clothes/things to resell on eBay to pay for tuition fees after getting inspiration from Gary Vee, it worked!

Reselling clothes to fund college

![Packaged parcels to send](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/lorimerjenkins/2020/2.jpeg)

Packaged parcels to send

[![Crypto Teen TikTok](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/lorimerjenkins/2020/3.png)\\
\\
Crypto Teen TikTok\\
\\
![Link](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/misc/link.svg)](https://lorimerjenkins.com/projects#crypto-teen)

Built Instagram follower bots

The IG bot started to work

Dipping my toes into coding

2019

## Joined the Ethereum community

I joined the Ethereum community in 2019 after learning about smart contracts.

![Ethereum was at $201.13!](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/lorimerjenkins/2019/1.jpeg)

Ethereum was at $201.13!

![](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/lorimerjenkins/2017/milestone.svg)

2017

## Hustling at School

While all my class mates were all selling sweets for some reason, I was fixing phone screens for cash.

Fixing iPhone home screens

## Angel Investing Disclosures
[**Lorimer Jenkins**](https://lorimerjenkins.com/)

[Home](https://lorimerjenkins.com/) [Writing](https://lorimerjenkins.com/writing) [Projects](https://lorimerjenkins.com/projects) [Bookshelf](https://lorimerjenkins.com/bookshelf) [Angel](https://lorimerjenkins.com/angel) [Links](https://linktr.ee/lorimerjenkins)

üé≤Random‚ñº

üá∫üá∏EN-US‚ñº

[Home](https://lorimerjenkins.com/) [Writing](https://lorimerjenkins.com/writing) [Projects](https://lorimerjenkins.com/projects) [Bookshelf](https://lorimerjenkins.com/bookshelf) [Angel](https://lorimerjenkins.com/angel) [Links](https://linktr.ee/lorimerjenkins)

üé≤Random‚ñº

üá∫üá∏EN-US‚ñº

This page contains important disclosures regarding my angel investing activities. Please read this information carefully before contacting me about investment opportunities.

## Personal Capital Only

I invest my own personal money. I am **not** a venture capital fund, I do **not** manage a fund, and I do **not** accept capital from limited partners (LPs) or any other external investors. All investment decisions are made solely by me using my own funds.

## Not Investment Advice

Nothing on this website should be construed as investment, legal, accounting, tax, or life advice. I am **not** authorised or regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) or any other financial regulatory body. Any investment decisions you make are your own responsibility.

## No Fiduciary Duty

I do not owe any fiduciary duty to founders or companies I invest in beyond what is set out in the relevant investment documentation. I am an investor, not an advisor, director, or fiduciary.

## Not a Solicitation

Nothing on this website constitutes a solicitation, offer, or recommendation to invest in any company, security, or investment product. Any information about my portfolio companies is for informational purposes only.

## No Guarantee of Investment

Contacting me or sending me your pitch does **not** guarantee that I will invest. I review opportunities selectively and invest in very few companies each year (maximum 1-2).

## Limited Availability

I'm currently a full-time founder and plan to be one for the foreseeable future, so I cannot allocate full-time attention to portfolio companies. I usually only invest in companies building in similar environments to what I am currently or have built in the past, so I can directly help with problem-solving.

## No Advisory Relationships

I do not advise companies or founders. I think advisors are misaligned (unless for really late-stage companies) ‚Äî [watch Steve Jobs explain why](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-c4CNB80SRc). I only angel invest in founders and ideas I want to get involved with and think I can help build.

## Early Stage Focus

I am probably not going to be helpful to later-stage founders. I am early stage myself and can best help people at the earliest stages (before Series A). But if you are a late-stage founder and think I could be helpful, I'm still interested.

## Tax Considerations

Any tax reliefs mentioned (such as SEIS or EIS) are subject to individual circumstances and HMRC rules. You should seek independent tax advice. I make no representations about the tax status of any investment.

## Confidentiality

If you share confidential information with me, I will treat it with reasonable care, but I cannot guarantee absolute confidentiality. I may be exposed to similar ideas from other founders. Do not share information you are not comfortable disclosing. Unless I have signed a separate written confidentiality agreement with you, I have no obligation to treat information you send me as confidential.

## Conflicts of Interest

I may invest in companies that compete with each other or with companies you are building. I am under no obligation to disclose my other investments to you, and I am under no obligation to refrain from investing in competing companies.

* * *

## Risk Warning

**Angel investing in early-stage companies involves a high degree of risk.** You could lose your entire investment. Past performance is not indicative of future results. The value of investments can go down as well as up. Early-stage investments are illiquid and you may not be able to sell your shares for many years, if ever.

* * *

#### UK Investor Status

I am a **Self-Certified Sophisticated Investor** under the Financial Services and Markets Act 2000 (Financial Promotion) Order 2005. I qualify on the basis of having worked in a professional capacity in the provision of finance for small and medium enterprises within the past two years (as a contractor for blockchain accelerator programs involving early-stage investment).

**For Founders:** By sharing investment materials with me, you confirm that you have conducted appropriate checks under the UK Financial Promotions regime and reasonably believe I am eligible to receive such communications. If you need me to sign a self-certification form before sharing your pitch, I'm happy to do so.

* * *

If you have any questions about these disclosures, please contact me at hellolorimerjenkins@gmail.com.

# Bookshelf

Books that have helped shape my thinking

AllFavoritesFinanceFictionBusinessMemoirHistory

7 books

![Spare](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/books/spare.jpeg)

## Spare

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

Prince Harry

Duke of Sussex

MemoirRead in 2025Published 2023

A candid look into royal life and the pressures of growing up in the public eye as a royal.

[View Book ‚Üí](https://www.amazon.com/Spare-Prince-Harry-Duke-Sussex/dp/0593593804)

![The Rise and Fall of the House of York](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/books/rise-and-fall-house-of-york.jpeg)

## The Rise and Fall of the House of York

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

Andrew Lownie

British historian and author

HistoryRead in 2025Published 2025

A biography that chronicles the lives of Prince Andrew and Sarah Ferguson, from their marriage to the present day.

[View Book ‚Üí](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0FL2T96TH)

![The Hard Thing About Hard Things](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/books/hard-thing-about-hard-things.jpg)

## The Hard Thing About Hard Things

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

Ben Horowitz

Co-founder of Andreessen Horowitz

BusinessRead in 2023Published 2014

Brutally honest advice on building and running a startup. No sugarcoating, just real experiences.

[View Book ‚Üí](https://www.amazon.com/Hard-Thing-About-Things-Building/dp/0062273205)

![What You Do Is Who You Are](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/books/what-you-do-is-who-you-are.jpg)‚òÖ

## What You Do Is Who You Are

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

Ben Horowitz

Co-founder of Andreessen Horowitz

BusinessRead in 2023Published 2019

Fascinating exploration of company culture through historical examples from Toussaint Louverture to Genghis Khan.

[View Book ‚Üí](https://www.amazon.com/What-You-Do-Who-Are/dp/0062871331)

![Zero to One](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/books/zero-to-one.jpg)‚òÖ

## Zero to One

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

Peter Thiel

Co-founder of PayPal and Palantir Technologies

BusinessRead in 2022Published 2014

It provides a guide for entrepreneurs on how to build monopolies and create value by questioning conventional wisdom to find new opportunities, challenge competition, and build valuable companies.

[View Book ‚Üí](https://www.amazon.com/Zero-One-Notes-Startups-Future/dp/0804139296)

![1984](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/books/1984.jpg)‚òÖ

## 1984

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

George Orwell

English novelist and essayist

FictionRead in 2021Published 1949

A chilling and prophetic dystopian novel that remains terrifyingly relevant today.

[View Book ‚Üí](https://www.amazon.com/1984-Signet-Classics-George-Orwell/dp/0451524934)

![Rich Dad Poor Dad](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/books/rich-dad-poor-dad.jpg)

## Rich Dad Poor Dad

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

Robert Kiyosaki

Entrepreneur and financial education advocate

FinanceRead in 2020Published 1997

A great introduction to financial literacy and the importance of assets over liabilities.

[View Book ‚Üí](https://www.amazon.com/Rich-Dad-Poor-Teach-Middle/dp/1612680011)

Made with ‚ù§Ô∏è

# Projects

![AO The Computer .com logo](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/projectLogos/aothecomputer.png)

## AO The Computer .com

2025‚Ä¢Built

A friend told me a story of being able to aquire a really saught after domain for next to nothing, I was amazed (plus a tad jelous) and couldn't stop thinking about the killer deal he got. So I started searching Namecheap to see if there were any other killer deals up for grabs. Turns out [AO The Computer .com](https://aothecomputer.com/) was available to purchase for $11.48 a year, take that \[redacted\] üòú.

[![Figma](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/figma.svg)Figma](https://www.figma.com/) [![Webflow](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/webflow.svg)Webflow](https://webflow.com/)

[website](https://aothecomputer.com/)

![AO The Computer .com](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/projects/aothecomputer.png)

![Content Creator logo](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/projectLogos/contentCreator.jpg)

## Content Creator

2025‚Ä¢Creator

I create short form video content across all major social media platforms that support reels. I aim for them to be a great way to build my online community, show the world what I am working on and meet new people in new places.

[![Veed](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/veed.svg)Veed](https://www.veed.io/) [![Figma](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/figma.svg)Figma](https://www.figma.com/) [![Repurpose.io](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/repurposeio.svg)Repurpose.io](https://repurpose.io/)

[youtube](https://youtube.com/@LorimerJenkins)[instagram](https://www.instagram.com/lorimer_jenkins)[tiktok](https://www.tiktok.com/@lorimer.jenkins)[x](https://x.com/lorimer_jenkins)[linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/lorimerjenkins/recent-activity/videos)[substack](https://substack.com/@lorimer)[facebook](https://www.facebook.com/lorimerjenkins)[pinterest](https://pinterest.com/lorimer_jenkins)[threads](https://www.threads.com/@lorimer_jenkins)[snapchat](https://www.snapchat.com/@lorimer_jenkins)[bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/lorimerjenkins)[linktree](https://linktr.ee/lorimerjenkins)

[![Content Creator video 1](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/ContentCreator/1.png)](https://youtube.com/shorts/ZRaYWTjygaQ)[![Content Creator video 2](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/ContentCreator/2.png)](https://youtube.com/shorts/dtOlytbvoHU)[![Content Creator video 3](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/ContentCreator/3.png)](https://www.youtube.com/shorts/y3zE3u0YPGs)

![LiquidOps logo](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/projectLogos/liquidOps.svg)

## LiquidOps

2024‚Ä¢Co-founder & CEO

A lending and borrowing protocol built on [AO](https://ao.arweave.net/), aiming to unlock over $400m worth of [Arweave](https://arweave.org/) tokens value. I co-founded the project with [Marton Lederer](https://x.com/martonlederer), became the 1st Fellow led company to spin out of [Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com/), attracted thousands of [waitlist](https://x.com/Liquid_Ops/status/1863863983498805473?s=20) signups which grew to $55m soft-commits for the idea with on-chain fund verification, [pitched](https://x.com/aoTheVentures/status/1813676139795374171?s=20) at [AO Ventures](https://www.aoventures.io/) demo day and then raised a [$325k pre-seed round](https://www.ibtimes.co.uk/revolutionizing-defi-how-lorimer-jenkins-marton-lederer-are-transforming-arweave-liquidops-1729945). We launched mainnet, have numerious intergrations including the AO Chrome/IOS/Andriod wallets [Wander](https://wander.app/) ( [demo here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ODxijaC0Dc)) & [Beacon](https://getbeaconapp.com/) ( [demo here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GeQ01-rBUPQ&t=11s)). We also completed & passed audits by the firms [Spearbit](https://cantina.xyz/solutions/spearbit) & [Quantstamp](https://quantstamp.com/).

[![TypeScript](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/typescript.svg)TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/) [![React](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/react.svg)React](https://react.dev/) [![Next.js](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/nextjs.svg)Next.js](https://nextjs.org/) [![Figma](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/figma.svg)Figma](https://www.figma.com/) [![CSS](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/css.svg)CSS](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS) [![MongoDB](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/mongodb.svg)MongoDB](https://www.mongodb.com/) [![Lua](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/lua.svg)Lua](https://www.lua.org/) [![Heroku](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/heroku.svg)Heroku](https://www.heroku.com/) [![Bun](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/bun.svg)Bun](https://bun.sh/) [![Netlify](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/netlify.svg)Netlify](https://www.netlify.com/) [![Git](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/git.svg)Git](https://git-scm.com/) [![HTML](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/html.svg)HTML](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML) [![Arweave](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/arweave.svg)Arweave](https://www.arweave.org/) [![AO](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/ao.svg)AO](https://ao.arweave.dev/) [![Markdown](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/markdown.svg)Markdown](https://www.markdownguide.org/) [![GitHub Actions](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/githubActions.svg)GitHub Actions](https://github.com/features/actions) [![Prettier](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/prettier.svg)Prettier](https://prettier.io/) [![Webflow](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/webflow.svg)Webflow](https://webflow.com/)

[website](https://labs.liquidops.io/)[x](https://x.com/Liquid_Ops)[youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@Liquid_Ops)[github](https://github.com/useLiquidOps)[defillama](https://defillama.com/protocol/liquidops)[linktree](https://linktr.ee/LiquidOps)[npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/liquidops)

![LiquidOps](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/projects/LiquidOps.png)

![Cool Arweave Address logo](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/projectLogos/coolarweaveaddress.png)

## Cool Arweave Address

2024‚Ä¢Built

This repo allows you to generate lots of [Arweave 4096-bit RSA-PSS JWK's](https://medium.com/@perma_dao/wallet-and-did-in-the-arweave-ecosystem-5714877fe745) to find cool and unique wallet addresses. Claude will automatically detect the cool addresses based on your desired parameters.

[![TypeScript](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/typescript.svg)TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/) [![Bun](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/bun.svg)Bun](https://bun.sh/) [![Arweave](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/arweave.svg)Arweave](https://www.arweave.org/) [![Git](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/git.svg)Git](https://git-scm.com/) [![Prettier](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/prettier.svg)Prettier](https://prettier.io/) [![Claude](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/claude.svg)Claude](https://claude.ai/)

[github](https://github.com/LorimerJenkins/CoolArweaveAddress)

![Cool Arweave Address](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/projects/coolarweaveaddress.png)

![AO HTML logo](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/projectLogos/aohtml.png)

## AO HTML

2024‚Ä¢Built

AO HTML is a tool that enables you to create a webpage via a HTML file that auto updates based on content delivered from the AO network via a process. Imagine a decentralised website with content delivery via a decentralised provider like a DAO, for example the website would auto update after a DAO proposal was approved and all Web2 front ends on Vercel/Netlify would too using this script.

[![Lua](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/lua.svg)Lua](https://www.lua.org/) [![JavaScript](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/javascript.svg)JavaScript](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript) [![HTML](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/html.svg)HTML](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML) [![AO](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/ao.svg)AO](https://ao.arweave.dev/) [![Git](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/git.svg)Git](https://git-scm.com/) [![Npm](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/npm.svg)Npm](https://www.npmjs.com/) [![Parcel.js](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/parceljs.svg)Parcel.js](https://parceljs.org/) [![NPX](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/npx.svg)NPX](https://docs.npmjs.com/cli/v11/commands/npx)

[github](https://github.com/labscommunity/AO_HTML)

![AO HTML](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/projects/aohtml.png)

![Subsidise.js logo](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/projectLogos/subsidisejs.png)

## Subsidise.js

2023‚Ä¢Built

Subsidise JS is a package built to enable [Arweave 4096-bit RSA-PSS JWK's](https://medium.com/@perma_dao/wallet-and-did-in-the-arweave-ecosystem-5714877fe745) to bundle transactions together and pay gas fees for other users transactions via the [ANS-102](https://github.com/ArweaveTeam/arweave-standards/blob/master/ans/ANS-102.md) Arweave network standard. I planned to intergrate this into other projects who wanted to cover their users gas upload fees, which would enable users to not have to pay AR tokens to use a Web 2 consuer app built on Arweave.

[![TypeScript](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/typescript.svg)TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/) [![Node.js](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/nodejs.svg)Node.js](https://nodejs.org/) [![Npm](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/npm.svg)Npm](https://www.npmjs.com/) [![Git](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/git.svg)Git](https://git-scm.com/) [![Arweave](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/arweave.svg)Arweave](https://www.arweave.org/) [![Jest](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/jest.svg)Jest](https://jestjs.io/) [![Irys](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/irys.svg)Irys](https://irys.xyz/) [![Prettier](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/prettier.svg)Prettier](https://prettier.io/)

[github](https://github.com/LorimerJenkins/Subsidise-JS)[npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@othent/pay)

![Subsidise.js](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/projects/subsidisejs.png)

![Othent logo](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/projectLogos/othent.svg)

## Othent

2023‚Ä¢Founder & CEO

The mission of [Othent](https://othent.io/) was to enable normal everyday online consumers to access blockchain projects, without the use of complex cryptographic private keys and instead use any Oauth account access like Google. I founded the project as the 1st outside Fellow incubated within [Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com/), a software development company founded by [Tate Berenbaum](https://x.com/TateBerenbaum) in the [Arweave](https://arweave.org/) ecosystem. [Othent](https://othent.io/) was then aquired by [Wander](https://wander.app/) into their core product, an [Arweave](https://arweave.org/) & [AO](https://ao.arweave.net/) ecosystem Web3 wallet that has over 50,000 users, becoming [Wander Connect](https://www.wander.app/connect).

[![TypeScript](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/typescript.svg)TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/) [![Next.js](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/nextjs.svg)Next.js](https://nextjs.org/) [![Node.js](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/nodejs.svg)Node.js](https://nodejs.org/) [![CSS](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/css.svg)CSS](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS) [![MongoDB](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/mongodb.svg)MongoDB](https://www.mongodb.com/) [![Heroku](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/heroku.svg)Heroku](https://www.heroku.com/) [![React](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/react.svg)React](https://react.dev/) [![React Native](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/react.svg)React Native](https://reactnative.dev/) [![Npm](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/npm.svg)Npm](https://www.npmjs.com/) [![Netlify](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/netlify.svg)Netlify](https://www.netlify.com/) [![Git](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/git.svg)Git](https://git-scm.com/) [![Figma](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/figma.svg)Figma](https://www.figma.com/) [![HTML](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/html.svg)HTML](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML) [![Auth0](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/auth0.svg)Auth0](https://auth0.com/) [![Arweave](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/arweave.svg)Arweave](https://www.arweave.org/) [![Markdown](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/markdown.svg)Markdown](https://www.markdownguide.org/) [![Expo](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/expo.svg)Expo](https://expo.dev/) [![GitHub Actions](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/githubActions.svg)GitHub Actions](https://github.com/features/actions) [![JWT](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/jwt.svg)JWT](https://jwt.io/) [![Prettier](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/prettier.svg)Prettier](https://prettier.io/)

[website](https://othent.io/)[x](https://x.com/KeysArentSimple)[github](https://github.com/othent)[npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/othent)

![Othent](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/projects/Othent.png)

![Wallety logo](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/projectLogos/wallety.png)

## Wallety

2022‚Ä¢Founder & CEO

A [Polkadot](https://polkadot.com/) & [Kusama](https://kusama.network/) ecosystem analytics website, which aimed to show users useful analytics about their wallets like spending, monthly usuage, CSV exporting and money paid in network fees. I raised 2 grants from the [Kusama DAO](https://dune.com/substrate/kusama-gov), which were later returned as I wanted to join [Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com/).

[![JavaScript](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/javascript.svg)JavaScript](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript) [![Python](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/python.svg)Python](https://www.python.org/) [![HTML](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/html.svg)HTML](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML) [![CSS](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/css.svg)CSS](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS) [![Npm](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/npm.svg)Npm](https://www.npmjs.com/) [![Netlify](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/netlify.svg)Netlify](https://www.netlify.com/) [![Git](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/git.svg)Git](https://git-scm.com/) [![Figma](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/figma.svg)Figma](https://www.figma.com/) [![Markdown](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/markdown.svg)Markdown](https://www.markdownguide.org/) [![Polkadot](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/polkadot.svg)Polkadot](https://polkadot.network/) [![Kusama](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/kusama.svg)Kusama](https://kusama.network/)

[website](https://wallety.org/)[github](https://github.com/WalletyOrg)[linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/company/78871022)

![Wallety](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/projects/Wallety.png)

![Crypto Teen logo](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/projectLogos/cryptoTeen.png)

## Crypto Teen

2020‚Ä¢Creator

[Crypto Teen](https://www.tiktok.com/@lorimer__jenkins) is a cryptocurrency TikTok channel aiming to educate Gen Z on what crypto is, covering basic concepts and know-how in the Web3 blockchain space.

[![TikTok](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/icons/tools/tiktok.svg)TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/)

[tiktok](https://www.tiktok.com/@lorimer__jenkins)

[![Crypto Teen video 1](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/CryptoTeen/1.png)](https://www.tiktok.com/@lorimer__jenkins/video/7232079074049543429)[![Crypto Teen video 2](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/CryptoTeen/2.png)](https://www.tiktok.com/@lorimer__jenkins/video/7232094831651196165)[![Crypto Teen video 3](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/CryptoTeen/3.png)](https://www.tiktok.com/@lorimer__jenkins/video/7232075618685390085)

## Agreement to Terms

By accessing and using lorimerjenkins.com (the "Site"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use the Site.

## Description of Service

Lorimerjenkins.com is a personal website owned and operated by Lorimer Jenkins. The Site provides information about my work, projects, angel investing activities, and other content I choose to share.

## Use of the Site

### Acceptable Use

You agree to use the Site only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe upon the rights of others or restrict their use of the Site. Prohibited activities include, but are not limited to:

- Attempting to gain unauthorized access to the Site or its systems
- Transmitting viruses, malware, or other harmful code
- Using automated systems (bots, scrapers) without permission
- Harassing, threatening, or defaming others
- Violating any applicable laws or regulations
- Attempting to interfere with the Site's functionality

### Access to the Site

I reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue the Site at any time without notice, restrict access to certain parts of the Site, and block users who violate these Terms.

## Angel Investing Information

The angel investing section of this Site is provided for informational purposes only. Nothing on this Site constitutes investment advice, an offer to buy or sell securities, or financial, legal, tax, or accounting advice. I am not authorised or regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA). Please see my [angel investing disclosures](https://lorimerjenkins.com/disclosures) for full details.

## Intellectual Property

Unless otherwise noted, all content on the Site, including but not limited to text, images, graphics, logos, videos, and code, is the property of Lorimer Jenkins and is protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to access and use the Site for personal, non-commercial purposes. You may not reproduce, distribute, or republish Site content without permission, modify or create derivative works, use Site content for commercial purposes, or remove copyright or proprietary notices from content.

## Submissions and Communications

If you submit pitch materials, business plans, or other information to me regarding potential investment opportunities: you retain ownership of your materials, you grant me a non-exclusive license to review and analyse your materials, I am under no obligation to review your materials or invest, I may receive similar ideas from other sources, and you are responsible for protecting your own confidential information.

## External Links

The Site may contain links to third-party websites or resources. These links are provided for convenience only. I am not responsible for the content, accuracy, or practices of external sites, any damages resulting from your use of external sites, or the availability of external sites.

## Disclaimer of Warranties

**THE SITE IS PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND**, either express or implied, including but not limited to warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, that the Site will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free, or regarding the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of content.

## Limitation of Liability

**TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, LORIMER JENKINS SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY** indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, loss of profits, revenue, data, or use, damages arising from your use of the Site, investment losses, or damages from reliance on any information on this Site.

This limitation applies regardless of the legal theory and even if I have been advised of the possibility of such damages. **In no event shall my total liability exceed the amount you paid to access the Site (which is zero).**

## Indemnification

You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Lorimer Jenkins from any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, and expenses arising from your use of the Site, your violation of these Terms, your violation of any rights of another party, any investment decisions you make, or any materials you submit.

## Privacy

Your use of the Site is also governed by my [Privacy Policy](https://lorimerjenkins.com/privacy), which is incorporated into these Terms by reference.

## Changes to Terms

I reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting with an updated "Last Updated" date. Your continued use of the Site after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.

## Governing Law

These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of England and Wales. Any disputes shall be resolved through good faith negotiation, and if that fails, the courts of England and Wales shall have exclusive jurisdiction.

## Severability

If any provision of these Terms is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall continue in full force and effect.

## Contact

If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact me at hellolorimerjenkins@gmail.com.

* * *

By using the Site, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

# Angel Investing

I love meeting fellow founders who are building something they genuinely care about. When I see potential and ways I can help beyond just capital, I'm eager to get involved early.

I typically write checks between **$500 and $5,000** in pre-seed and really early seed rounds. Although I don't write the biggest checks, I try to be useful. Whether that's introductions, product feedback, technical advice, or just being someone to talk through problems with, see more in depth information on what I do below.

Disclosure, I'm currently a full-time founder and plan to be one for the foreseeable future, so I cannot allocate full-time attention to portfolio companies. I usually only invest in companies building in similar environments to what I am currently or have built in the past, so I can directly help with problem-solving. Please see more [angel investing disclosures](https://lorimerjenkins.com/disclosures).

## My Portfolio

See more information on my [Crunchbase](https://www.crunchbase.com/person/lorimer-jenkins)

AllStablecoinsVenture StudioPrediction Market

![Upshot](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/angelInvestments/upshot.svg)

Prediction Market

The world's first high-stakes prediction card platform, built in the Base ecosystem.

[Retrimentum](https://x.com/retrimentum)Pre-seed Extension ¬∑ 2025

[See the project](https://upshot.cards/)

![Vela Ventures](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/angelInvestments/velaventures.svg)

Venture Studio

Web3 venture studio behind apps like [Beacon](https://getbeaconapp.com/), [Vento](https://ventoswap.com/?tab=swap) and [AO Sync](https://github.com/vela-ventures/ao-sync-sdk).

[William Kibbler](https://x.com/kibbler_william) & [Ellis Kilbane](https://x.com/EllisKilbane)Funding round ¬∑ 2025

[See the project](https://vela.ventures/)

![Astro](https://lorimerjenkins.com/images/angelInvestments/astro.svg)

Stablecoins

Astro simplifies blockchain liquidity management as a stablecoin issuer.

[Kadar Sayed Abdi](https://x.com/0xKadar)Pre-seed ¬∑ 2024

[See the project](https://www.astrousd.com/)

## Notable Things I Have Done That Could Help You

- I cannot advise you on legal/accounting issues, but I can point you in the direction of those who can ‚Äî lawyers, accountants, and professionals (and try to make sure you don't get scammed with high fees). To date I have created 4 limited companies in the UK and 1 Delaware C corporation.
- Taught myself to be a fullstack developer from the internet
- Managed small lightweight teams that can execute fast
- Successfully closed multiple fundraising rounds from VCs, accelerators, grant foundations, and decentralised blockchain treasuries
- Failed at raising fundraising rounds
- Worked in startups/VCs/corporates and held pretty much every role, including CEO, engineer, analyst, had COO responsibilities and been a private software contractor
- As you can probably tell from my website, I am SCRAPPY. It is a superpower I have and one I hope I can help you develop/nurture.
- Launched a waitlist which had thousands of signups and grew to $55m in soft commits
- Built/designed/launched numerous products in startup and corporate environments
- Made pitch decks, pitches, and business plans successfully and unsuccessfully

## I Take On Problems Under Pressure and Solve Them

- Fixed 2 major black swan events in a live mainnet DeFi protocol
- Survived 3 major crypto bear markets
- Spoken in front of live/online audiences and both succeeded and TOTALLY fluffed speeches
- Purchased IP, sold IP, and acquired companies
- Built teams and both hired and fired team members
- Worked with accountants, lawyers, freelancers, and marketing firms
- Cold emailed companies/people successfully (these days I prefer warm intros)
- Pivoted products
- Had to be creative to solve delicate problems, usually with numerous sensitive verticals
- Had to give 1-1 negative feedback and also received it many times
- Been de-banked as a crypto founder
- Stood up to and squashed workplace & other founder bullies
- Worked in great company cultures, worked in bad ones, built good ones, and fixed my own company's culture numerous times
- In a previous life I was an actor. I can help you look human in social media content and demo day pitches
- Had successful VC pitches and really really bad ones
- Dealt with co-founder disputes multiple times
- Been through accelerator programs
- Judged and participated in hackathons (still not won one yet, loser)
- I know how to design products and how to use tools like Figma and Webflow

## Major Mistakes I Have Made That I Don't Want You To

- Spent over $50k USD on a funding round's legal fees that could have been $5k
- Spent $75k USD on an audit for a pre-product-market-fit product
- Spent a year building product and not fully focused on growth and marketing
- Triggered a tax bill that wiped out all my life savings and put me personally into a -$26k net worth and in debt overnight
- Absolutely demolished my credit score and personal finances as a founder, then rebuilt it
- Forgotten the value of a dollar and how far they go
- Lost literally thousands of dollars to fees from careless mistakes using incorrect software
- Developed and lost having a personal ego

## Building something interesting?

I'd love to hear about it.

[Pitch me](mailto:hellolorimerjenkins@gmail.com)

Read my [angel investing disclosures](https://lorimerjenkins.com/disclosures)

## Privacy Policy Overview

[Home](https://lorimerjenkins.com/) [Writing](https://lorimerjenkins.com/writing) [Projects](https://lorimerjenkins.com/projects) [Bookshelf](https://lorimerjenkins.com/bookshelf) [Angel](https://lorimerjenkins.com/angel) [Links](https://linktr.ee/lorimerjenkins)

üé≤Random‚ñº

üá∫üá∏EN-US‚ñº

## Introduction

Welcome to lorimerjenkins.com (the "Site"). This Privacy Policy explains how Lorimer Jenkins ("I," "me," or "my") collects, uses, and protects information when you visit this personal website.

## Information I Collect

### Automatically Collected Information

When you visit the Site, I automatically collect certain information through Google Analytics, including:

- Your IP address (anonymized)
- Browser type and version
- Device type and operating system
- Pages you visit and time spent on each page
- Referring website or source
- Geographic location (country/city level)
- Date and time of your visit

### Information You Provide

Currently, this Site does not collect personal information directly from users through forms or accounts, with the following exception:

**Angel Investing Enquiries:** If you contact me regarding angel investment opportunities via email, I may receive and store information you choose to provide, including your name, email address, company information, pitch materials, and any other information contained in your correspondence.

## How I Use Your Information

I use the information collected through Google Analytics to understand how visitors use the Site, improve content and user experience, analyse traffic patterns, and monitor Site performance.

I use information provided via angel investing enquiries to evaluate potential investment opportunities, communicate with founders, and maintain records of investment-related correspondence.

## Google Analytics

This Site uses Google Analytics, a web analytics service provided by Google LLC. Google Analytics uses cookies to help analyse how users interact with the Site. For more information about how Google uses data, please visit: [Google's Privacy Policy](https://policies.google.com/technologies/partner-sites)

## Opting Out

You can opt out of Google Analytics by installing the [Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on](https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout) or adjusting your browser settings to block or delete cookies.

## Cookies

Cookies are small text files stored on your device. This Site uses cookies only through Google Analytics for the purposes described above. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.

## Data Retention

Google Analytics data is retained for 26 months from the date of collection, after which it is automatically deleted. Information provided via angel investing enquiries is retained for as long as reasonably necessary or as required by law.

## Angel Investing Communications

If you send me pitch materials or other investment-related information:

- I will treat your information with reasonable care
- I may share information with professional advisors under confidentiality obligations where necessary
- I cannot guarantee absolute confidentiality
- I do not sell or share your information with third parties for marketing purposes
- You should not send information you are not comfortable disclosing

## Third-Party Links

The Site may contain links to third-party websites. I am not responsible for the privacy practices of these external sites. I encourage you to review their privacy policies.

## Your Rights

Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your data, including the right to access information I hold about you, request deletion of your data, object to processing, and data portability. To exercise these rights, please contact me at hellolorimerjenkins@gmail.com.

## For EU Visitors (GDPR)

If you are located in the European Union, you have additional rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). The legal basis for processing your data is legitimate interest in improving and analysing the Site, and for angel investing communications, legitimate interest in evaluating potential investment opportunities.

## For California Visitors (CCPA)

If you are a California resident, you have rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), including the right to know what personal information is collected and the right to request deletion.

## Children's Privacy

This Site is not directed to children under the age of 18. I do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If you believe I have inadvertently collected such information, please contact me to have it removed.

## Changes to This Policy

I may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last Updated" date.

## Security

While I strive to protect your information, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure. I cannot guarantee absolute security of data transmitted to or stored on the Site.

## Contact

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact me at hellolorimerjenkins@gmail.com.

* * *

By using this Site, you consent to the collection and use of information as described in this Privacy Policy.
